text:
@Mike_Pence @VP In the past 72 hours we've learned:

1. Trump knew Putin was hunting our soldiers.
2. Putin successfully killed our soldiers.
3. The Admin. knowingly sold faulty anti-body testing kits.
4. COVID-19 had its largest ever single day cases.
5. Trump tweeted a "white power" video.

entity.name: Trump says he discussed Venezuela and the Mueller report with Putin in an hour-long call
entity.description: President Trump confirmed the call in a series of Tweets on Friday, adding that the political turmoil in Venezuela was also a subject of a phone conversation with Russia's Vladimir Putin. Referring to the report's conclusion that Russia interfered in the 2016 election while clearing the Trump campaign of conspiracy, Trump said he and Putin discussed the "Russia Hoax."
